QueryViewSpec.Name: Installment balance greater than the recurring gift amount Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: This is used to find errors with changing schedules from non-monthly to monthly. Only checks installments since 1/1/12.
QueryViewSpec.Author: Caru Mayeda

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL:
with RGInstallmentsWithBalance as (select ft.ID as REVENUEID, i.ID as INSTALLMENTID, i.DATE as INSTALLMENTDATE, ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT as RGAMOUNT, i.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT as INSTALLMENTAMOUNT, dbo.UFN_RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENT_GETINSTALLMENTBALANCE(i.ID) as INSTALLMENTBALANCE, rsch.STATUSCODE, rsch.STATUS, so_child.NAME as CHILDNAME, ft.CALCULATEDUSERDEFINEDID as REVENUELOOKUPID from dbo.RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENT i join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTION ft ON ft.ID = i.REVENUEID join dbo.REVENUESCHEDULE rsch ON rsch.ID = ft.ID join dbo.REVENUESPLIT rsplit on rsplit.REVENUEID = ft.ID join dbo.SPONSORSHIP s on rsplit.ID = s.REVENUESPLITID left join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD so_child on so_child.ID = s.ID
where i.[DATE] >= '1/1/12' and rsch.STATUSCODE = 0-- = 'Active' ) select ib1.REVENUEID, ib1.RGAMOUNT, ib1.INSTALLMENTDATE, ib1.INSTALLMENTAMOUNT, ib1.INSTALLMENTBALANCE, ib1.STATUS, ib1.CHILDNAME, ib1.REVENUELOOKUPID
from RGInstallmentsWithBalance ib1
where INSTALLMENTBALANCE > RGAMOUNT
